definition[0]: inflated prices, amounts etc are high and unreasonable
example[0]: company directors on grossly inflated salaries
definition[1]: inflated ideas, opinions etc about someone or something make them seem better, more important etc than they really are
example[1]: He has a very inflated opinion of himself.
definition[3]: inflated prices, sums etc are unreasonably high
example[2]: These company directors are paid grossly inflated salaries.
